original: can bskyed la/_lha bskyed pa ni/_dbus su pad+ma dang zla ba'i steng du gtsho
analyzed: can skyed skyed ba su pad+ma dang zla ba steng du gtsho

original: mo gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum sngo ba dang dmar ba dang /_phyag brgyad ma
analyzed: mo gdugs dkar mo zhal gsum sngo ba dang dmar ba dang brgyad ma

original: gdugs dang /_'khor lo dang /_gzhu dang /_lcags kyu bsnams pa'o/_/
analyzed: gdugs dang lo dang dang kyu snom

original: g.yon na rgyal mtshhan dang rdo rje dang mda' dang zhags pa'o/_/shar du drag shul
analyzed: g.yon na rgyal mtshhan dang rdo rje dang mda dang zhags du drag shul

original: chen mo sngon mo dang /_lhor rtum mo chen mo ser mo dang /_nub tu 'bar ma
analyzed: chen mo sngon mo dang rtum mo chen mo ser mo dang tu bar ma

original: chen mo dmar mo/_byang du stobs chen mo ljang khu/_g.yas bum pa 'dzin pa/
analyzed: chen mo dmar du stobs chen mo ljang bum ba dzin

original: g.yon dkur brten pa'o/_/rtshibs bcu drug gi shar ma bzhi la/_gos
analyzed: g.yon dkur rten chu drug gi char ma bzhi

original: dkar mo/_dmar mo/_khro gnyer can ljang khu/_phreng ba ma ser mo/_pad
analyzed: dkar gnyer can ljang ba ma ser

original: ma'i rdo rje sngon mo/_bzhi ud pa la 'dzin pa'o/_/lho'i bzhi la gzhan gyis mi
analyzed: ma rdo rje sngon ud ba la dzin bzhi la gzhan gyis mi

original: thub ma sngon mo/_sgrol ma ljang khu/_mchod ma dkar mo/_gzi brjid ma ser
analyzed: thub ma sngon ma ljang ma dkar brjid ma ser

original: mo/_bzhi rdo rje dang dbyug pa thogs pa'o/_/nub tu lu gu rgyud ma dmar mo/
analyzed: rdo rje dang dbyug ba thogs tu lu gu brgyud ma dmar

original: spos ma ser mo/_stobs chen ma dkar mo/_rdo rje rigs 'dzin ma ljang khu/
analyzed: spros ma ser chen ma dkar rje rigs dzin ma ljang

original: bzhi po ni rdo rje dang bgrang phreng bsnams pa'o/_/byang du rdo rje rin chen ma
analyzed: bzhi po ni rdo rje dang bgrong phreng snom du rdo rje rin chen ma

original: dmar mo/_gtshug tor 'gying ma dkar mo/_gser can ma ljang khu'o/_/
analyzed: dmar tor gying ma dkar can ma ljang

original: sgrol ma ljang khu'o/_/bzhi po ni sna tshhogs rdo rje dang phreng ba'o/_/gru chad la sgrol
analyzed: sgrol ma ljang po ni sna tshhogs rdo rje dang phreng chad la sgrol

original: ma dkar mo/_pad+ma'i spyan dmar mo/_zla ba'i 'od sngon mo/_phyag rgya'i
analyzed: ma dkar spyan dmar ba d sngon rgya

original: tshhogs ljang khu/_bzhi po 'di skyabs sbyin byas pa'o/_/sgo ma bzhi dal gzhan
analyzed: tshhogs ljang po di skyob sbyin byed ma bzhi dal gzhan

original: dang 'thun no/_/om ma ma hum ni swa ha/_ces bzlas la dbang bskur ba ni
analyzed: dang thun ma ma hum ni swa bzlas la dbang skur ba ni

original: gtshug tor dkar mo'i'o/_/
analyzed: gtshug tor dkar

original: ri khrod lo ma can parna sha ba ri ser mo'i mngon par rtogs pa ni/_rgyu
analyzed: ri khrod lo ma can parna sha ba ri ser mo mngon ba rtogs ba

original: las pho brang rtshibs bzhi pa skyed la/_lha bskyed pa ni zla ba'i dal bam las pad+ma/
analyzed: las pho brang rtshibs bzhi ba skyed skyed ba ni zla ba dal bam las

original: bam las rdo rje/_de las bcom ldan 'das ma sku mdog ser mo zhal gsum/
analyzed: bam las rdo las joms ldan da ma sku mdog ser mo zhal

original: g.yas dkar ba/_g.yon dmar ba/_spyan gsum khro mo/_shing lo'i nam
analyzed: g.yas dkar dmar gsum khro lo nam

original: bza' dang rgyan gyis brgyan pa'o/_/phyag drug gi g.yas pa gsum na rdo rje dang dgra sta mda' bsnams pa'o/_/g.yon gsum na sdigs 'dzub dang bcas pa'i
analyzed: bza dang rgyan gyis rgyan drug gi g.yas ba gsum na rdo rje dang dgra sta mda snom gsum na sdigs dzub dang cha ba

original: zhags pa dang shing lo'i chun po dang gzhu bsnams pa'o/_/me tog gis bcings
analyzed: zhags ba dang shing lo chun po dang gzhu snom tog gis ching

original: pa'i cod pan la mi bskyod pas mtshhan pa'o/_/nad rigs stong phrag brgyad cu'i
analyzed: ba cod pan la mi skyod ba mtshhan rigs stong phrag brgyad cu

original: bdag mo bsgyel nas mnan pa/_g.yon pa'i khu tshhur gyis 'og gi bgegs gzir
analyzed: bdag mo sgyel nas gnon ba khu tshhur gyis g gi bgegs gzir

original: cing sdigs pa'o/_/phyogs bzhi na rgyal po chen po bzhis bden pa'i bka' bsgo
analyzed: cing sdigs bzhi na rgyal po chen po bzhis bden ba bka sgo

original: ba'o/_/om pi sha tshi par+na sha ba ri sarba ma ra pra sha ma ni swa ha/_zhes bzlas
analyzed: pi sha tshi par+na sha ba ri sarba ma ra pra sha ma ni swa bzlas

original: nas dbang bskur ba ni/_yum par+na sha ba ri'i cho ga'o/_/
analyzed: nas dbang skur ba par+na sha ba ri cho

original: gnod sbyin 'dzam b+ha lha ser po yab yum gyi mngon par rtogs pa ni/_rgyu
analyzed: gnod sbyin dzam b+ha lha ser po yab yum gyi mngon ba rtogs ba

original: las pad+ma 'dab brgyad sgo dang bcas pa bskyed la/_der dza dang pam gyur pa las/
analyzed: las pad+ma dab brgyad sgo dang cha ba skyed dza dang pam gyur ba

original: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po 'dzam b+ha lha zhal cig phyag bzhi pa sku mdog ser po gsus
analyzed: gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po dzam b+ha lha zhal cig phyag bzhi ba sku mdog ser po gsus

original: pa rab tu che ba g.yas na pi tshu pu ra dang /_g.yon nas ne'u la'i kha nas nor
analyzed: ba rab tu che ba g.yas na pi tshu pu ra dang nas neu la kha nas nor

original: 'dzag pa 'dzin pa/_phyag gnyis kyis rang 'dod kyis rig ma lha mo nor rgyun
analyzed: dzag ba dzin gnyis kyis rang dod kyis rig ma lha mo nor rgyun

original: ma g.yas pi tshi pu ra dang /_g.yon 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa/_yab yum rtshe ba'i
analyzed: ma g.yas pi tshi pu ra dang bras kyi snye ma snom yum rtshe ba

original: rtshed mo mdzad pa la pad+ma 'dab ma brgyad kyi steng du 'khor gnod sbyin chen po
analyzed: rtshed mo mdzad ba la pad+ma dab ma brgyad kyi steng du khor gnod sbyin chen po

original: mngon par rtogs pa mu tig gi phreng ba zhes bya ba/
analyzed: mngon ba rtogs ba mu tig gi phreng ba zhes byed

original: brgyad yum lha mo brgyad la 'khyud pa/_gtsho bo yab yum ji lta bar bskyed la
analyzed: brgyad yum lha mo brgyad la khyud bo yab yum ji lta ba skyed la

original: bzlas pa bya ba ni/_om dzam b+ha lha dza len tra ye dus dus sma kun+ne kun+we swa ha/
analyzed: bzlas ba byed ba dzam b+ha lha dza len tra ye dus dus sma kun+ne kun+we swa

original: zhes ci rigs par bzlas la dbang bskur ba ni/_gnod sbyin 'dzam b+ha lha'i
analyzed: zhes ci rigs ba bzlas la dbang skur ba sbyin dzam b+ha lha

original: longs spyod la mnga' mnyes pa'i cho ga'o//_//
analyzed: longs spyod la mnga mnyes ba cho

original: dpal mgon po ma ha ka la'i mngon par rtogs pa ni/_rgyu las 'khor lo
analyzed: dpal mgon po ma ha ka la mngon ba rtogs ba las khor lo

original: rtshibs brgyad sgo dang bcas pa bskyed la/_der nyi zla pad+ma'i steng du pam las ro'i
analyzed: rtshibs brgyad sgo dang cha ba skyed nyi zla pad+ma steng du pam las ro

original: gdan/_de'i steng du hum las gri gug_/de las ma ha ka la zhal cig phyag bzhi
analyzed: steng du hum las gri las ma ha ka la zhal cig phyag bzhi

original: pa/_thung la sbom pa sku sha rgyas pa/_spyan gsum bgrad pa/_zhal gdangs
analyzed: la sbom ba sku sha rgya gsum bgrad gdang

original: shing mche ba btshigs pa/_phyag g.yas gnyis na b+he tsha'i 'bru 'am/_gri gug
analyzed: shing mche ba btshigs g.yas gnyis na b+he tsha bru gug

original: thogs pa/_'og ma ral gri/_g.yon dang po thod pa khrag gis bkang ba/_'og
analyzed: thogs ma ral dang po thod ba khrag gis geng

original: ma na kha tram kha 'dzin pa/_stag gis lpags pas smad dkris pa/_zhabs phyed skyil
analyzed: ma na kha tram kha dzin gis lpags ba smad dkri phyed skyil

original: gyis bzhugs pa/_rtshibs brgyad la/_'khor bya rog ma brgyad/_gri gug dang thod pa thogs pa/_zhabs skyang skum gyis bzhugs pa skyed la/_spyan drangs
analyzed: gyis bzhugs brgyad byed rog ma gug dang thod ba thogs skyang skum gyis bzhugs ba skyed drangs

original: mchod la/_sngags ni/_om ma ha ka la hum phat/_zhes bzlas la dbang
analyzed: mchod ma ha ka la hum bzlas la dbang

original: bskur ba ni dpal ma ha ka la'i cho ga'o/
analyzed: skur ba ni dpal ma ha ka la cho

original: mngon par rtogs pa brgya rtsha brgyad po ni/_/de ltar ma lus bshad par
analyzed: mngon ba rtogs ba brgya rtsha brgyad po ltar ma lus chad ba

original: gyur mod kyang /_/phyi'i rgya mtshho la ni chu 'dzin gyis/_/chu blangs pas ni zad
analyzed: gyur mod kyang rgya mtshho la ni chu dzin blangs ba ni zad

original: par mi 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje 'dzin pa bdud rtshi'i chu rgyun rnams/_/'thor ba
analyzed: ba mi gyur rje dzin ba bdud rtshi chu rgyun ba

original: cig du bsdus pa'i bsod nams kyis/_/grub thabs dpag tu med pa rgyud
analyzed: cig du sdud ba bsod nams thabs dpog tu med ba brgyud

original: pa'i chos/_/mkhas pa'i dbang phyug gzhan don byed gyur cig_/jo bo
analyzed: ba ba dbang phyug gzhan don byed gyur bo
